11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_LOGGING_APM_DATA_DUMPER_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_LOGGING_APM_DATA_DUMPER_H_
13
14#include <stdint.h>
15#include <stdio.h>
16#include <string.h>
17
18#include <string>
19#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
20#include <memory>
21#include <unordered_map>
22#endif
23
24#include "absl/types/optional.h"
25#include "api/array_view.h"
26#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
27#include "common_audio/wav_file.h"
28#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
29#endif
30
31// Check to verify that the define is properly set.
32#if !defined(WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP) || \
33 (WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP != 0 && WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP != 1)
34#error "Set WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP to either 0 or 1"
35#endif
36
37namespace webrtc {
38
39#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
40// Functor used to use as a custom deleter in the map of file pointers to raw
41// files.
42struct RawFileCloseFunctor {
43 void operator()(FILE* f) const { fclose(f); }
44};
45#endif
46
47// Class that handles dumping of variables into files.
48class ApmDataDumper {
49 public:
50 // Constructor that takes an instance index that may
51 // be used to distinguish data dumped from different
52 // instances of the code.
53 explicit ApmDataDumper(int instance_index);
54
55 ApmDataDumper() = delete;
56 ApmDataDumper(const ApmDataDumper&) = delete;
57 ApmDataDumper& operator=(const ApmDataDumper&) = delete;
58
59 ~ApmDataDumper();
60
61 // Activates or deactivate the dumping functionality.
62 static void SetActivated(bool activated) {
63#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
64 recording_activated_ = activated;
65#endif
66 }
67
68 // Default dump set.
69 static constexpr size_t kDefaultDumpSet = 0;
70
71 // Specifies what dump set to use. All dump commands with a different dump set
72 // than the one specified will be discarded. If not specificed, all dump sets
73 // will be used.
74 static void SetDumpSetToUse(int dump_set_to_use) {
75#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
76 dump_set_to_use_ = dump_set_to_use;
77#endif
78 }
79
80 // Set an optional output directory.
81 static void SetOutputDirectory(const std::string& output_dir) {
82#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
83 RTC_CHECK_LT(output_dir.size(), kOutputDirMaxLength);
84 strncpy(output_dir_, output_dir.c_str(), output_dir.size());
85#endif
86 }
87
88 // Reinitializes the data dumping such that new versions
89 // of all files being dumped to are created.
90 void InitiateNewSetOfRecordings() {
91#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
92 ++recording_set_index_;
93#endif
94 }
95
96 // Methods for performing dumping of data of various types into
97 // various formats.
98 void DumpRaw(const char* name, double v, int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
99#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
100 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
101 return;
102
103 if (recording_activated_) {
104 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
105 fwrite(&v, sizeof(v), 1, file);
106 }
107#endif
108 }
109
110 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
111 size_t v_length,
112 const double* v,
113 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
114#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
115 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
116 return;
117
118 if (recording_activated_) {
119 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
120 fwrite(v, sizeof(v[0]), v_length, file);
121 }
122#endif
123 }
124
125 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
126 rtc::ArrayView<const double> v,
127 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
128#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
129 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
130 return;
131
132 if (recording_activated_) {
133 DumpRaw(name, v.size(), v.data());
134 }
135#endif
136 }
137
138 void DumpRaw(const char* name, float v, int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
139#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
140 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
141 return;
142
143 if (recording_activated_) {
144 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
145 fwrite(&v, sizeof(v), 1, file);
146 }
147#endif
148 }
149
150 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
151 size_t v_length,
152 const float* v,
153 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
154#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
155 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
156 return;
157
158 if (recording_activated_) {
159 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
160 fwrite(v, sizeof(v[0]), v_length, file);
161 }
162#endif
163 }
164
165 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
166 rtc::ArrayView<const float> v,
167 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
168#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
169 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
170 return;
171
172 if (recording_activated_) {
173 DumpRaw(name, v.size(), v.data());
174 }
175#endif
176 }
177
178 void DumpRaw(const char* name, bool v, int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
179#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
180 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
181 return;
182
183 if (recording_activated_) {
184 DumpRaw(name, static_cast<int16_t>(v));
185 }
186#endif
187 }
188
189 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
190 size_t v_length,
191 const bool* v,
192 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
193#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
194 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
195 return;
196
197 if (recording_activated_) {
198 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
199 for (size_t k = 0; k < v_length; ++k) {
200 int16_t value = static_cast<int16_t>(v[k]);
201 fwrite(&value, sizeof(value), 1, file);
202 }
203 }
204#endif
205 }
206
207 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
208 rtc::ArrayView<const bool> v,
209 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
210#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
211 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
212 return;
213
214 if (recording_activated_) {
215 DumpRaw(name, v.size(), v.data());
216 }
217#endif
218 }
219
220 void DumpRaw(const char* name, int16_t v, int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
221#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
222 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
223 return;
224
225 if (recording_activated_) {
226 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
227 fwrite(&v, sizeof(v), 1, file);
228 }
229#endif
230 }
231
232 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
233 size_t v_length,
234 const int16_t* v,
235 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
236#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
237 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
238 return;
239
240 if (recording_activated_) {
241 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
242 fwrite(v, sizeof(v[0]), v_length, file);
243 }
244#endif
245 }
246
247 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
248 rtc::ArrayView<const int16_t> v,
249 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
250#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
251 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
252 return;
253
254 if (recording_activated_) {
255 DumpRaw(name, v.size(), v.data());
256 }
257#endif
258 }
259
260 void DumpRaw(const char* name, int32_t v, int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
261#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
262 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
263 return;
264
265 if (recording_activated_) {
266 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
267 fwrite(&v, sizeof(v), 1, file);
268 }
269#endif
270 }
271
272 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
273 size_t v_length,
274 const int32_t* v,
275 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
276#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
277 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
278 return;
279
280 if (recording_activated_) {
281 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
282 fwrite(v, sizeof(v[0]), v_length, file);
283 }
284#endif
285 }
286
287 void DumpRaw(const char* name, size_t v, int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
288#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
289 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
290 return;
291
292 if (recording_activated_) {
293 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
294 fwrite(&v, sizeof(v), 1, file);
295 }
296#endif
297 }
298
299 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
300 size_t v_length,
301 const size_t* v,
302 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
303#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
304 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
305 return;
306
307 if (recording_activated_) {
308 FILE* file = GetRawFile(name);
309 fwrite(v, sizeof(v[0]), v_length, file);
310 }
311#endif
312 }
313
314 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
315 rtc::ArrayView<const int32_t> v,
316 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
317#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
318 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
319 return;
320
321 if (recording_activated_) {
322 DumpRaw(name, v.size(), v.data());
323 }
324#endif
325 }
326
327 void DumpRaw(const char* name,
328 rtc::ArrayView<const size_t> v,
329 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
330#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
331 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
332 return;
333
334 DumpRaw(name, v.size(), v.data());
335#endif
336 }
337
338 void DumpWav(const char* name,
339 size_t v_length,
340 const float* v,
341 int sample_rate_hz,
342 int num_channels,
343 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
344#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
345 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
346 return;
347
348 if (recording_activated_) {
349 WavWriter* file = GetWavFile(name, sample_rate_hz, num_channels,
350 WavFile::SampleFormat::kFloat);
351 file->WriteSamples(v, v_length);
352 }
353#endif
354 }
355
356 void DumpWav(const char* name,
357 rtc::ArrayView<const float> v,
358 int sample_rate_hz,
359 int num_channels,
360 int dump_set = kDefaultDumpSet) {
361#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
362 if (dump_set_to_use_ && *dump_set_to_use_ != dump_set)
363 return;
364
365 if (recording_activated_) {
366 DumpWav(name, v.size(), v.data(), sample_rate_hz, num_channels);
367 }
368#endif
369 }
370
371 private:
372#if WEBRTC_APM_DEBUG_DUMP == 1
373 static bool recording_activated_;
374 static absl::optional<int> dump_set_to_use_;
375 static constexpr size_t kOutputDirMaxLength = 1024;
376 static char output_dir_[kOutputDirMaxLength];
377 const int instance_index_;
378 int recording_set_index_ = 0;
379 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::unique_ptr<FILE, RawFileCloseFunctor>>
380 raw_files_;
381 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::unique_ptr<WavWriter>> wav_files_;
382
383 FILE* GetRawFile(const char* name);
384 WavWriter* GetWavFile(const char* name,
385 int sample_rate_hz,
386 int num_channels,
387 WavFile::SampleFormat format);
388#endif
389};
390
391} // namespace webrtc
392
393#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_LOGGING_APM_DATA_DUMPER_H_
